TEXT: e1: The morning-after pill has a number of side effects.
e2: A differentiated analysis of its side effects is not achievable for a layperson without medical advice.

TEXT: e3: However these are clearly stated on the package insert,

TEXT: e4: and a request for an early termination of a pregnancy is the right of every woman.

TEXT: e5: The morning-after pill should only be prescribed after counselling by a physician or pharmacist.
